name: Veggie Dicer
description:
In this master chef’s kitchen, we only serve one thing: DICED vegetable soup! It’s up to YOU to gather the ingredients and keep up with the orders. But be weary, in this kitchen the vegetables fight back, each with their very own unique fighting style! Use your deadly spinning DICE-ROLL to chop ‘em up and bring ‘em back to the stove. That is, if you can make it there….

Also, play the short Tutorial for the lore :)
